name: pnp-list-formatting-christmas-tree
title: Christmas Tree
shortDescription: This sample draws a tree across rows in 3 different stages 'alt' as top, 'body' as tree and 'wood' as bottom. You can also include icons in the tree. The Title field will appear as a tooltip on the icons.
longDescription: This sample draws a tree across rows in 3 different stages 'alt' as top, 'body' as tree and 'wood' as bottom. You can also include icons in the tree. The Title field will appear as a tooltip on the icons.

metadata.value: customCardProps, beakStyle, directionalHint, hideSelection, hideColumnHeader, rowFormatter

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
